entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 4:38PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW AND POTENTIAL WINTRY MIX OF PRECIPITATION EXPECTED FOR BRISTOL BAY THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... Another round of winter weather is set to affect the Bristol Bay area Thursday morning through Friday evening. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected for most of Bristol Bay north of King Salmon as a front moves ashore from south to north Thursday

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 6:26AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Along Norton Sound and Yukon Delta Coast Today...
